title: Typerepublic
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215918/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215918/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Typerepublic**

TypeRepublic is an independent type foundry based in Barcelona ( [Spain](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215918/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Spain)).  
Founder and principal designer [Andreu Balius](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215918/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Andreu%20Balius) has designed (and designs) an exclusive collection of typefaces to be distributed throughout this website.

[www.typerepublic.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215918/http:/www.typerepublic.com/ "www.typerepublic.com")
author: ab
